DOC.HEADLINE: 10 # 000 GAYS MARCH IN PROTEST IN ROME
DOC.TEXT: An estimated 10 # 000 homosexuals demonstrated in central Rome on Saturday to protest against what they said was the indifference of Prime_Minister Silvio Berlusconi ' s new conservative government . Led by Rome Mayor Francesco Rutelli and marching behind a banner that said " Proud to Be Here , " they filed through the streets of the capital to press demands for greater rights including official recognition of gay couples . Berlusconi , a conservative media tycoon , became prime_minister in May at the head of a government that also includes the neo-fascist National Alliance , some of whose members are strongly opposed to homosexuals .
